messages.content: Peter Underwood is a politician you can trust. He has worked in both the Westminster and European Parliaments and understands how to make things happen at a local, national and international level.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.

For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.
Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone. We oppose a Britain of 'us and them' created by the Brexit vote.

issues.brexitEurope: Westminster politicians have failed us all on Brexit. Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People’s Vote. Greens would campaign to Remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
issues.environment: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.
issues.transport: Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means better transport.

leaflet.personalStatement: Peter has lived in Croydon for nearly twenty years and currently works for a charity supporting community groups to look after our precious parks and woodlands. He is also a longstanding member of his local Residents’ Association and Chair of Croydon Friends of the Earth. Peter wants to put control of politics back into your hands. Letting you decide on our future relationship with the EU. Working together to prevent environmental and ecological collapse. Supporting our public services and protecting our green spaces.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has worked in both the Westminster and European Parliaments and understands how to make things happen at a local, national and international level.

endorsements.endorsement: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest.

Supporting our public services and protecting our green spaces.
Westminster politicians have failed us all on Brexit.
Greens will take action to transform Britain so that it works for everyone.
